ingredients: Creamy broth ramen made from a blend of chicken and pork broth. Served with arugula  ajitama (umami egg)  red onions  and your choice of chicken or pork chashu.

Creamy paitan broth ramen made from a mixture of chicken and pork with black garlic oil. Served with scallions  seared bamboo shoots  and bean sprouts & red cabbage mix. Choose between chicken or pork chashu.
Kids ramen under 12. 1/2 portions of paitan broth and noodles  includes ajitama and choice of chicken or pork chashu. No extras available.

The spicy version of our creamy paitan ramen with a hint of nuttiness. Served with fresh cilantro  ajitama (umami egg)  toasted cashew nuts  roasted cherry tomatoes  white onion  house made la-yu (chili oil) and your choice of protein.**Contains sesame
Creamy vegan broth with kale noodles topped with ATX kakiage tempura ball made with onions  arugula  and beni-shoga.
Rice with your choice of chicken or pork chashu topped with our special japanese dressing.
5 or 10 deep fried chicken wings tossed with our Japanese curry rub.
Octopus balls is our ball-shaped Japanese snack made with wheat flour-based batter filled with octopus topped with mayo  takoyaki sauce  bonito flakes  aonori  and beni shouga.
Tempura onions  arugula  and beni-shoga seasoned with ao-nori salt.
Criss cut waffle fries served with Yuzu Aioli.
